sources.title: Galloping Romeo
sources.description: Money is mysteriously disappearing from a locked trunk atop the stage even though the trunk arrives still locked. When pals Bob Rivers (Bob Steele) and Grizzly (George 'Gabby' Hayes) get the jop driving the stage, the same thing happens.

sources.title: Galloping Romeo (1933) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Doris Hill, George 'Gabby' Hayes 
Director: Robert N. Bradbury

Money is mysteriously disappearing from a locked trunk atop the stage even though the trunk arrives still locked. When pals Bob Rivers and Grizzly get the job driving the stage, the same thing happens.

metadata.Plot: Money is mysteriously disappearing from a locked trunk atop the stage even though the trunk arrives still locked. When pals Bob Rivers and Grizzly get the job driving the stage, the same thing happens.
metadata.Writer: Robert N. Bradbury, Harry L. Fraser
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Doris Hill, George 'Gabby' Hayes
